item.title: Help Making "kill" command on 317
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Xevi, post:19, topic:413398”]KK My Errors Are: [IMG]http://i1238.photobucket.com/albums/ff482/Zibz/Errors.jpg[img]

CAN ANYONE HELP!?!?!?![/quote]

Change it so it works with your source. Your path to config.java is different from yours etc.

For the first error, it is all pretty much “c.” Try removing them and see what you get. You will have to find the declaration of playerName in order to get the path right to call that method.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Making "kill" command on 317
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("kill") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("david") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("david")|| c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("david"))) {
				String name = playerCommand.substring(5);
				for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
					if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
						if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) {
							Client other = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i];
							other.getCombat().applyPlayerHit(i, other.playerLevel[3]);
							other.gfx100(1224);
							c.forcedText = "It's OVER 9000!";
							c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
							c.startAnimation(4304);
						}
					}
				}
			}

Change the names

item.title: Help Making "kill" command on 317
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

[quote=“Xevi, post:1, topic:413398”]Ok, So what I’ve got is:
if (command.startsWith(“kill”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(4);
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.sM(“You have just been struck down by King 123”);
c.lowGFX(1621, 0);
c.appendHit(255, 0);
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

And When I Compile I Get:
client.java:9220: error: cannot find symbol
c.appendHit(255, 0);

symbol: method appendHit(int,int)
location: variable c of type client
1 error

If You Can Help please leave a post of the correct way to code it thanks![/quote]
declare appendHit

Read full topic

item.title: Help Making "kill" command on 317
item.dc:creator: @Xevi Xevi
item.description:
@Xevi wrote:

Ok, So what I’ve got is:
if (command.startsWith(“kill”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(4);
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.sM(“You have just been struck down by King 123”);
c.lowGFX(1621, 0);
c.appendHit(255, 0);
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

And When I Compile I Get:
client.java:9220: error: cannot find symbol
c.appendHit(255, 0);

symbol: method appendHit(int,int)
location: variable c of type client
1 error

If You Can Help please leave a post of the correct way to code it thanks!
